thread.title: BRIEF-Apricus Biosciences Receives Complete Response Letter From FDA For Vitaros

title: BRIEF-Apricus Biosciences Receives Complete Response Letter From FDA For Vitaros
text: February 16, 2018 / 12:40 PM / in 11 minutes BRIEF-Apricus Biosciences Receives Complete Response Letter From FDA For Vitaros Reuters Staff Feb 16 (Reuters) - Apricus Biosciences Inc: * APRICUS BIOSCIENCES RECEIVES COMPLETE RESPONSE LETTER FROM FDA FOR VITAROS * APRICUS BIOSCIENCES INC - CRL INDICATES THAT FDA CANNOT APPROVE NDA FOR VITAROS IN ITS PRESENT FORM * APRICUS BIOSCIENCES INC - CRL IDENTIFIES DEFICIENCIES RELATED TO CHEMISTRY, MANUFACTURING AND CONTROL FOR VITAROS * APRICUS BIOSCIENCES - CRL ALSO IDENTIFIES CERTAIN SAFETY CONCERNS SPECIFIC TO 2.5% CONCENTRATION OF DDAIP.HCL IN CURRENT FORMULATION FOR VITAROS * APRICUS BIOSCIENCES INC - GOAL OF PROVIDING MARKET AN UPDATE ON CRL ASSESSMENT IN EARLY MARCH OF THIS YEAR Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
